text: Undercover is a British television comedy drama series about a bumbling cop working undercover in an Armenian crime family. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2015 British television series debuts Category:2015 British television series endings Category:2010s British comedy television series Category:2010s British crime television series Category:Dave (TV channel) original programming Category:English-language television shows
